homePage.title: The Barista café
homePage.panel1:
Meet the place where quality meets taste.
Our coffee is brewed to perfection, ensuring every sip is a delight. 
Whether you prefer a classic espresso or a creamy latte, we have something for everyone.

about.title: About The Barista
about.description: Founded in 2015, The Barista is a cozy café dedicated to serving the finest coffee sourced from sustainable farms around the world. Our baristas are trained to create the perfect cup every time, while our relaxing atmosphere makes it the ideal place to work, meet friends, or simply enjoy a moment of calm in your busy day.
about.openingHours:
Monday - Friday: 7:00 AM - 8:00 PM
Saturday - Sunday: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a question about our menu, want to book an event, or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out.
